description: "An Atlas produced by an expedition in central Sumatra, including: maps of topography, geology, a number of rivers in the region; drawings of mountains, graphs of lengths of roads; family trees of the royal families of Djambi (Jambi) and Palembang."
title: "Midden-Sumatra reizen en onder-zoekingen der Sumatra-expeditie ... 1877-1879 - van P.J. Veth [cartographic material]."
